solution_line_template: He needs to keep his total time at {max_total_time} or below because {total_mazes} x {max_avg} = <<{total_mazes}*{max_avg}={max_total_time}>>{max_total_time}
His total time spent in the other mazes is {total_other_time} because {other_mazes} x {avg_other} = <<{other_mazes}*{avg_other}={total_other_time}>>{total_other_time}
His total time spent in the five mazes thus far is {time_so_far} because {total_other_time} + {current_time} = <<{total_other_time}+{current_time}={time_so_far}>>{time_so_far}

He can spend {max_additional_time} more minutes on this maze before his average go above 60 because {max_total_time} - {time_so_far} = <<{max_total_time}-{time_so_far}={max_additional_time}>>{max_additional_time}
